description: CSS styles for theme management and layout of the App component in an online tic-tac-toe frontend.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class styling including text alignment, background color, and transition effects.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the app with flexible layout, background color, and text styling.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the app's logo image, including height and pointer events.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling with color transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning and hover effects.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Animation keyframes for spinning effect on the app's logo.
